message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I think that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the market value, however, this product offers unique advantages and its value goes beyond similar products. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. Can you consider that?
